mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Bg_Order (user_id, address_id, payment_method, payment_price, order_status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{addressId}, #{payType}, #{totalPrice}, 'ORDERED')

INSERT INTO Bg_Order_item (order_id, product_id, amount, price) VALUES
(#{orderId}, #{item.productId}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.price})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT o.id) FROM Bg_Order o LEFT JOIN Bg_User u ON o.user_id = u.id
INNER JOIN Bg_Order_item oi ON o.id = oi.order_id INNER JOIN Bg_Product p ON oi.product_id = p.id
AND o.user_id = #{userId}
AND u.login_id LIKE '%' || #{loginId} || '%'
AND p.product_name LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
AND o.order_status = #{status}
AND date(o.created_at) >= date(#{startDate})
AND date(o.created_at) <= date(#{endDate})

SELECT o.id AS id, o.user_id AS userId, u.login_id AS loginId, a.recipient AS recipient, a.recipient_phone AS recipientPhone, o.payment_method AS payType, o.payment_price AS totalPrice, a.postcode AS postcode, a.address AS address, a.detail_address AS detailAddress, o.order_status AS status, o.created_at AS createdAt FROM Bg_Order o LEFT JOIN Bg_Address a ON o.address_id = a.id LEFT JOIN Bg_User u ON o.user_id = u.id
INNER JOIN Bg_Order_item oi ON o.id = oi.order_id INNER JOIN Bg_Product p ON oi.product_id = p.id
AND o.user_id = #{userId}
AND u.login_id LIKE '%' || #{loginId} || '%'
AND p.product_name LIKE '%' || #{productName} || '%'
AND o.order_status = #{status}
AND date(o.created_at) >= date(#{startDate})
AND date(o.created_at) <= date(#{endDate})
GROUP BY o.id, o.user_id, u.login_id, a.recipient, a.recipient_phone, o.payment_method, o.payment_price, a.postcode, a.address, a.detail_address, o.order_status, o.created_at
ORDER BY o.payment_price ASC DESC
ORDER BY o.created_at ASC DESC
ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
